casebody.data:
TUNSTALL
v.
Frank W. BALLANCE, et al. No. 323A92-10. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Charles Alonzo Tunstall, Lumberton, for Tunstall, Charles Alonzo. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of August 2015 by Petitioner to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
